name: Cotera
long_description: Cotera is an AI agent platform that connects directly to your data warehouse and APIs, enabling businesses to build agents that take actions across their systems. With built-in tools, a visual workflow editor, and fine-grained control, teams can deploy agents at scale for use cases like intelligent ticket routing, voice-of-customer analysis, and proactive customer health monitoring.
one_liner: The fastest way to build an AI agent
